activities: We may collect directly from our clients the following personal information derived from vendor payment records: Employee name, mobile number, wireless service and data usage, billing data. We do not retain or store any personally identifiable information.
personaldata: As described in our privacy policy we comply with our customers privacy policies and may store names, telephone numbers, and email addresses.  We do not store protected personally identifiable information.
privacyprograms: Internal self-regulatory privacy program. We have an annual SSAE 16 SOC I Type II audit report on our proprietary technology solution. Our technology solution is access controlled and not available for use by the general public.
recoursemech: We have an internal compliance program that consists of a direct hotline that connects with our external counsel and by email (compliance@widepoint.com). Complaints filed through this program are reviewed by legal counsel and discussed with senior management and the governance board and any other committee that may be required to resolve credible complaints.
